tnote.storage

Class FileReadHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • tnote.storage.FileReadHandler

  • public class FileReadHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles reading of any files within the system. Files are text files containing strings Strings will be read using a Reader object, while objects will be serialized using Gson
    Author:
    A0124131B
